resources.string: Customize your QS panel and notifications

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see a significant improvement in battery life. For a good user experience, we recommend you set the amount of disabled pixels at 75 percent.

If you find a bug with any of these settings, post in the Bug Reports section of our Google+ page. You MUST include the following when posting a bug report:

1. A logcat or last_kmsg
2. Kernel and mods used
3. Useful information

If you fail to report something adequately, DO NOT expect things to be fixed.
Press on color below to apply

Be advised that the custom carrier label is not available in the extended statusbar area, also known as the quick settings area. Also using emojis as your carrier label might cause some visibility issues on lighter backgrounds.
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
View or change power menu entries
Disable power menu on secure lockscreen
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Show a brightness icon to the right of the brightness slider to adjust auto-brightness
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Double tap to sleep on lockscreen
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double tap to sleep on status bar
Double tap on status bar to put the device to sleep
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display negotiated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Adjust the rocker orientation based on current rotation
Force volume keys to control media stream
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Answer the call when volume keys pressed
Launch music app on headset connection
From headset if connected and playing music
Display a warning at bottom of the QS panel while your network is monitored by external apps or a VPN
Change the date\'s visibility underneath the clock widget
Change the alarm text\'s visibility underneath the clock widget
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
This will hide all force close notifications
Apply a custom icon pack for Recents panel
Use Slim Recents instead of the default recents view
View the settings for Slim Recents
Are you sure you want to reset Slim Recent to stock color?
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Apps to not show in the panel
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Select which navigation mode to use on your device
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
A very unique and fully-customizable gesture-based navigation bar
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first.\n\nAlso, setting a double tap action will delay single tap a bit.
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar.
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
When keyboard is showing, long press left or right to move the text cursor to left or right.\nKeep longpressing to keep moving the cursor, single tap on bar to go to home screen.
Are you sure you want to reset Fling to stock settings?
Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic visualizer on the navigation bar
Enabling this will make pulse use your current accent color. It will disable Lava Lamp
Used also as fallback for automatic color
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Sync color with album arts. Overrides Lava Lamp and lines opacity.

When in editor mode, medium press and drag a button to change its position or long press a button to show the edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.\n\nSetting a double tap action will delay single tap a bit.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing or music is playing
Set how long the system will wait before triggering a longpress action
Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on the screen's brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead of LTE
Double tap power to toggle torch (will add a small delay to single tap)
Long press power to toggle torch

This feature allows for the ability to show the current music track info on the lockscreen with or without Ambient display enabled.

You can select from two layouts, normal and minimal. While this feature takes advantage of ambient display, it does not depend on it. It can be triggered without having ambient display enabled by using the (forced) options.

Normal view includes the lockscreen clock, date and ticker.

Minimal view includes just the ticker at the center of the screen.
Enter a custom label. Leave blank to use your network name
Select which image editor to use to edit screenshots with
Notifications sound and vibration if screen is on
Double tap on empty navbar areas to sleep
Play the notification sound of each app only once per set time period
Display the number of pending notifications
Configure statusbar clock and date appearance
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Condition icon is shown on Lockscreen
Condition icon is hidden on Lockscreen
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Failed to uninstall, check root access
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: at your own risk!
Disable quick settings tiles on secured lockscreen
This is test for selected toast animation
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Displays a live design on lockscreen while music is playing
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery.
Display and customize battery bar near status bar or navigation bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Apps to not show when tapping on a Share button
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
Allow scrolling through the small QS tiles
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
For better visibility on bright images
Click on any image to use for static mode
Select an image to use for static mode
Beautify quick settings with custom headers
Disable the tile running services icon in the footer
Disable the tile edit icon in the footer
Apply a tint to the background based on the homescreen wallpaper
Delay until long press action starts
Trigger back gesture on landscape from
Back gesture must start below this percentage of the screen
For all changes to take effect, a SystemUI restart is required. Restart SystemUI now?
Avoid using Lockscreen weather along with custom Lockscreen clock styles, especially on lower DPI as clock might cut out of screen.
It will enable Device Accent on QS Tiles
This feature requires a SystemUI restart to be applied. Restart SystemUI now?
